text:
Once "JMS Subscriber" is run - it will keep open connection to JMS server (ActiveMQ in my case).

if User has Tread with multi-users then the "JMS Subscriber" from the first tread will consume all messages from a queue.

ER: each user in its tread has to be able to consume a message from a queue. 

My understanding is that the first "JMS Subscriber" does not close its connection (it was defined by ActiveMQ Web Console).

So, it could be "fix" by adding "Close Connection" flag to "JMS Subscriber" sampler with ON as default value.
creator: slavko_h@yahoo.com

text:
Hello,
Please provide your JMX test so that we can reproduce the case.

Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
r1183374
The issue is not reproducible anymore.
I have used "Stop between samples" ON - that closes connections properly.

The issues can be closed for the specified release.
